name: AIFI Research
title: Research Team
bio: The AIFI research team covers the intersection of artificial intelligence and financial services, tracking funding trends, technology adoption, and market dynamics across the industry.

name: Maya Patel
title: Senior Fintech Analyst
bio: Maya covers AI adoption in banking, payments, and lending. Before joining AIFI as an analyst, she spent six years at a global consulting firm advising retail banks on technology strategy. She holds an MBA from Columbia Business School and writes about how machine learning changes the way money moves.

name: Daniel Krause
title: Quantitative Research Director
bio: Daniel writes about quantitative finance, trading systems, and the ML models behind them. He previously led a quant research team at a mid-size systematic hedge fund and holds a PhD in applied mathematics from ETH Zurich. His work focuses on where academic ML research meets production trading systems.

name: Sarah Okonkwo
title: Risk & Compliance Editor
bio: Sarah covers risk management, insurance, and compliance technology. She spent a decade in financial crime compliance at two tier-one banks before moving to research and writing. She brings an operator's perspective to how AI tools perform under real regulatory pressure and production workloads.
